hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Dharr said:"My beloved Prophet advised me to do three things which I will never give up, if Allah wills. He advised me to pray Duha, to pray Witr before sleeping, and to fast three days of each month

chapter.ara-name: باب صَوْمِ ثَلاَثَةِ أَيَّامٍ مِنَ الشَّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Fasting Three Days of The Month
